snippet.title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla: Official Ubisoft Forward 30 Minutes Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Join the Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Quest Director, Philippe “Phyz” Bergeron, as he delves into assaults, boss fights, flyting, drinking contests, world exploration, and more.

 Assassin’s Creed Valhalla will be available on 17th November 2020 on Xbox One, PlayStation®4 system, Epic Games, Uplay & Stadia.
 Also coming to Xbox Series X and PlayStation®5. Pre-order now at https://www.assassinscreed.com/buy

Pre-order now and get an additional mission: The Way of the Berserker

Follow Assassin’s Creed:
WEBSITE: https://www.assassinscreed.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/assassinscreed

00:00 Intro 
00:44 Assault 
02:41 Rued Boss Fight 
05:05 Quest to Recruit Assault Force 
06:53 Raid on King's Bury 
09:35 Player Choice 
11:26 Open World Exploration 
12:35 Longship Gameplay 
14:48 Flyting 
16:35 Fishing 
17:24 Meeting Some Strangers 
20:08 Chasing a Flying Paper 
20:35 Environmental Puzzles 
22:07 Mystic Boss Encounter 
24:36 Building a Cairn 
25:58 Attending the Wedding 
27:57 Consequence of Choice 
28:55 Boss Battle 
30:25 Checking in on a Friend 
31:16 Watch More
